name: Cat Mario 5 (Bored Cloud)
description:
You can follow the development of the game on Youtube.

Youtube Link

Hi! I was wondering what it would be like for someone to make a Cat Mario sequel. However, I am still unsure. Based on what you've seen so far, do you think this could be something? (My English is very bad. If you find a spelling mistake, please let me know..)

Plans for the future:

Playable maps (8 worlds... you know)

Map editor

And more stuff...
